00057 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ParticleTrack {
00058 
00059 public:
00060 
00064     struct Vertex {
00065         EGS_Vector x;   
00066         EGS_Float e;    
00067 
00068         Vertex() : x(0,0,0), e(0) {};
00069         Vertex(EGS_Float px, EGS_Float py, EGS_Float pz) {
00070                 x.x = px; x.y = py; x.z = pz; e = 1;};
00071         Vertex(EGS_Float px, EGS_Float py, EGS_Float pz, EGS_Float pe) {
00072                 x.x = px; x.y = py; x.z = pz; e = pe;};
00073         Vertex(const EGS_Vector &px, EGS_Float pe) : x(px), e(pe) {};
00074     };
00075 
00077     struct ParticleInfo {
00078         EGS_I32 q;      
00079         ParticleInfo(EGS_I32 pq) { q = pq; };
00080         ~ParticleInfo() { };
00081     };
00082 
00084     EGS_ParticleTrack() : m_pInfo(NULL), m_size(16), m_nVertices(0) {
00085         m_track = new Vertex* [m_size];
00086     }
00087 
00089     ~EGS_ParticleTrack() {
00090         clearTrack();
00091         if (m_track) delete [] m_track; m_track = NULL;
00092     };
00093 
00099     void clearTrack();
00100 
00106     int writeTrack(ofstream *trsp);
00107 
00109     void addVertex(Vertex *x);
00110 
00116     Vertex* getVertex(int v);
00117 
00119     int getNumVertices() { return m_nVertices; };
00120 
00122     void setParticleInfo(ParticleInfo *p) { m_pInfo = p; };
00123 
00125     ParticleInfo* getParticleInfo() { return m_pInfo; };
00126 
00127 protected:
00128 
00130     void grow();
00131 
00132     ParticleInfo    *m_pInfo;       
00133 
00134     int             m_size;         
00135     int             m_nVertices;    
00136     Vertex          **m_track;      
00137 };

00149 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ParticleTrackContainer {
00150 
00151 public:
00152 
00154     EGS_ParticleTrackContainer() : m_nEvents(0), m_nTracks(0),
00155     m_totalTracks(0), m_stackMap(NULL), m_isScoring(NULL), m_bufferSize(0),
00156     m_buffer(NULL), m_trspFile(NULL) {};
00157 
00165     EGS_ParticleTrackContainer(const char* fname, int buf_size) : m_nEvents(0),
00166     m_nTracks(0), m_totalTracks(0), m_isScoring(NULL), m_bufferSize(0), m_buffer(0),
00167     m_trspFile(NULL) {
00168         m_bufferSize = buf_size;
00169 
00170         // initialize the arrays
00171         m_buffer = new EGS_ParticleTrack* [m_bufferSize];
00172         m_stackMap = new int [m_bufferSize];
00173         m_isScoring = new bool [m_bufferSize];
00174         for (int i = 0; i < m_bufferSize; ++i) {
00175             m_buffer[i] = new EGS_ParticleTrack();
00176             m_stackMap[i] = -1;
00177             m_isScoring[i] = false;
00178         }
00179 
00180         // open output file and write header
00181         m_trspFilename = string(fname);
00182         m_trspFile = new ofstream(m_trspFilename.c_str(), ios::binary);
00183         int dummy = 0;
00184         // at the end this will be replaced with the number of recorded tracks
00185         m_trspFile->write((char *)&dummy, sizeof(int));
00186     };
00187 
00189     ~EGS_ParticleTrackContainer() {
00190         // if any particles are left in memory -> flush them to the file
00191         if (m_nTracks > 0) flushBuffer();
00192 
00193         if (m_buffer) {
00194             for (int i = 0; i < m_bufferSize; i++) {
00195                 if (m_buffer[i])
00196                     delete m_buffer[i]; m_buffer[i] = NULL;
00197             }
00198             delete [] m_buffer; m_buffer = NULL;
00199         }
00200         if (m_stackMap) delete [] m_stackMap;
00201         if (m_isScoring) delete [] m_isScoring;
00202         if (m_trspFile) delete m_trspFile; m_trspFile = NULL;
00203     };
00204 
00206     void setEvents(int e) { m_nEvents = e; }
00207 
00209     int getEvents() { return m_nEvents; }
00210 
00212     int getCurrentNumVertices() {
00213         return (m_nTracks > 0) ? m_buffer[m_nTracks-1]->getNumVertices() : 0;
00214     };
00215 
00217     void addVertex(EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *x);
00218 
00225     void addVertex(int stackIndex, EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *x);
00226 
00230     EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex* getTrackVertex(int tr, int v);
00231 
00233     bool isScoringParticle() { return m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1]; }
00234 
00236     bool isScoringParticle(int stackIndex) {
00237         return m_isScoring[m_stackMap[stackIndex]];
00238     }
00239 
00241     void stopScoringParticle() { m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] = false; }
00242 
00244     void stopScoringParticle(int stackIndex) {
00245         m_isScoring[m_stackMap[stackIndex]] = false;
00246         m_stackMap[stackIndex] = -1;
00247     }
00248 
00250     void startNewTrack();
00251 
00259     void startNewTrack(int stackIndex);
00260 
00262     void startNewTrack(EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *p);
00263 
00265     void setParticleInfo(int stackIndex, EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *p) {
00266         m_buffer[m_stackMap[stackIndex]]->setParticleInfo(p);
00267     }
00268 
00270     void setCurrentParticleInfo(EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *p) {
00271         m_buffer[m_nTracks-1]->setParticleInfo(p);
00272     }
00273 
00275     int readDataFile(const char *filename);
00276 
00280     void reportResults(bool with_header = true);
00281 
00282 protected:
00283 
00290     void flushBuffer();
00291 
00296     void updateHeader();
00297 
00298     int                 m_nEvents;      
00299     int                 m_nTracks;      
00300     int                 m_totalTracks;  
00301 
00302     int                 *m_stackMap;    
00305     bool                *m_isScoring;   
00308     int                 m_bufferSize;   
00309     EGS_ParticleTrack   **m_buffer;     
00310     ofstream            *m_trspFile;    
00311     string              m_trspFilename; 
00312 };
